definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: etym. and exact mng. dub.; evidently some shining substance; AV amber; supposed by Thes (q. v.) and most to be a brilliant amalgam of gold and silver, LXX h)/lektron (v. Liddell & Scott s. v.

), Vulgate electrum; v. also Dl in Baer:Ezech. xii; only in the combination ´[[כְּעֵין ח]] like the appearance of ´[[ח]] Ez Eze 1:4, Eze 1:27; [[בְּעֵין הַחַשְׁמַָלָה]] Ez Eze 8:2 (on ending [[ה]]—[[ָ]] v. Ges:§ 90, 2 R a; Co del.)
